snippet: Neil Patrick Harris will leave hit Broadway show "Hedwig and the Angry Inch" and Andrew Rannells will slip into his old wigs....

headline.print_headline: Neil Patrick Harris Leaving 'Hedwig' on Broadway
headline.main: Neil Patrick Harris Leaving 'Hedwig' on Broadway

lead_paragraph: Neil Patrick Harris will leave hit Broadway show "Hedwig and the Angry Inch" and Andrew Rannells will slip into his old wigs.
